rukus.text: 5|78|Isara'ila-bansadharadera madhye yara kuphari karechila tara da'uda o mara'iyama-putra ‘isara mukhe abhisapta hayechila [1]. Ta e jan'ye ye, tara abadhyata karechila ara tara simalanghana karata.
5|79|Tara yesaba gar'hita kaja karata ta hate tara eke an'yake barana karata na. Tara ya karata ta kata'i na nikrsta

5|80|tadera anekake apani kapheradera sathe bandhutba karate dekhabena. Tadera antara ya tadera jan'ya pesa kareche (tadera kara kajagulo) kata nikrsta! Ye karane allaha tadera upara raganbita hayechena. Ara tara ayabe'i sthayi habe.
5|81|Ara tara allaha o nabira prati ebam tara prati ya nayila hayeche tate imana anale kapheraderake bandhurupe grahana karata na, kintu tadera aneke'i phasika.

5|82|Abasya'i muminadera madhye satrutaya manusera madhye iyahudi o musarikaderake'i apani sabaceye ugra dekhabena. Ara yara bale, ‘amara nasara’ manusera madhye taderake'i apani muminadera kachakachi bandhutbe dekhabena, ta e'i karane ye, tadera madhye aneka pandita o sansarabiragi rayeche. Ara ejan'ye'o ye, tara ahankara kare na.

5|83|Ara rasulera prati ya nayila hayeche ta yakhana tara sune, takhana tara ye satya upalabdhi kare tara jan'ya apani tadera cokha asru bigalita dekhabena [1]. Tara bale, ‘he amadera raba! Amara imana enechi; kaje'i apani amaderake saksyabahadera talikabhukta karuna.’
5|84|‘Ara allahara prati o amadera kache asa satyera prati imana na anara ki karana thakate pare yakhana amara pratyasya kari ye, amadera raba amaderake nekakara sampradayera antarbhukta karabena?’
5|85|Atahpara tadera e kathara jan'ya allaha tadera puraskara nirdista karechena jannate, yara padadese nadi prabahita; tara sekhane sthayi habe. Ara eta muhasinadera puraskara.
5|86|Ara yara kuphari kareche o amadera ayatasamuhe mithyaropa kareche, tara'i jahannamabasi.
